Package cams.controller.camp

Class CampManager

java.lang.Object
cams.controller.camp.CampManager
public class CampManager extends Object
This class handles the logic and processing related to camps.

  • Constructor Details

    • CampManager

      public CampManager()

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      public static void createCamp(String campName, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date regCloseDate, eFaculty userGroup, eLocation location, int totalSlots, int CCSlots, String description, Boolean visibility) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a camp and adds it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      campName - Name of camp.
      startDate - Start date of camp.
      endDate - End date of camp.
      regCloseDate - Registration closing date of camp.
      userGroup - Faculty camp is open to.
      location - Location of camps.
      totalSlots - Number of participants allowed.
      CCSlots - Number of camp committee members allowed.
      description - Description of camp.
      visibility - Visibility of camp.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - if a camp with the same ID is already in the repository.

    • deleteCamp

      public static void deleteCamp(String campID) throws ParticipantAlreadyRegisteredException, ModelNotFoundException, OperationCancelledException
      Deletes a camp in the repository. Will ask for confirmation. Users cannot delete a camp if there are already participants registered for the camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp to delete.
      Throws:
      ParticipantAlreadyRegisteredException - if there are already participants registered for the camp.
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID cannot be found in the repository.
      OperationCancelledException - if user cancels the operation.

    • getListByFilter

      public static List<Camp> getListByFilter()
      Gets a list of camps from the repository with no filter.
      Returns:
      Return all camps if current user is a staff. Return camps that are visible and in the users faculty or NTU if user is a student.

    • getListByFilterExcludeSelf

      public static List<Camp> getListByFilterExcludeSelf()
      Gets a list of camps from the repository with no filter. Excludes camp that the student is a committee member for. Used to retrieve list of camps a camp committee member can submit enquiries for.
      Returns:
      Return camps that are visible and in the users faculty or NTU if user is a student.

    • getListByFilter

      public static List<Camp> getListByFilter(eFaculty filter)
      Gets a list of camps from the repository filtered by faculty.
      Parameters:
      filter - Faculty of camp.
      Returns:
      Return all camps in the faculty if current user is a staff. Return camps that are visible and in the faculty if user is a student.

    • getListByFilter

      public static List<Camp> getListByFilter(eLocation filter)
      Gets a list of camps from the repository filtered by location.
      Parameters:
      filter - Location of camp.
      Returns:
      Return all camps in the location if current user is a staff. Return camps that are visible and in the users faculty or NTU if user is a student.

    • getListByFilter

      public static List<Camp> getListByFilter(Date start, Date end)
      Gets a list of camps from the repository filtered by date.
      Parameters:
      start - Start date.
      end - End date.
      Returns:
      Return all camps within the dates if current user is a staff. Return camps that are within the dates and in the users faculty or NTU if user is a student.

    • getListByFilter

      public static List<Camp> getListByFilter(Date regBy)
      Gets a list of camps from the repository filtered by registration closing date.
      Parameters:
      regBy - Registration closing date.
      Returns:
      Return all camps that closes before the specified date if current user is a staff. Return camps that that closes before the specified date and in the users faculty or NTU if user is a student.

    • editName

      public static void editName(String ID, String name) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Edit name of camp.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to edit.
      name - New name.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

      Parameters:

      start - New start date.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

      public static void editTotalSlots(String ID, int slots) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Edit total participant slots of camp.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to edit.
      slots - New number of slots.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

      public static void editCCSlots(String ID, int slots) throws ModelNotFoundException

      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to edit.
      slots - New number of slots.

      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to edit.
      decription - New description.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

    • editVisibility

      public static void editVisibility(String ID, boolean visibility) throws ModelNotFoundException, ParticipantAlreadyRegisteredException
      Edit visibility of camp. Cannot make invisible if camp already has participants.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to edit.
      visibility - New visibility.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.
      ParticipantAlreadyRegisteredException - if camp already has registered participants.

    • getRemainingCCSlots

      public static int getRemainingCCSlots(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Get remaining camp committee slots of a camp.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp.
      Returns:
      remaining camp committee slots
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

    • addAttendee

      public static void addAttendee(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Add student to a camp as attendee. Student will be current user.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

    • addCommittee

      public static void addCommittee(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Add student to a camp as camp committee. Student will be current user.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.

    • removeAttendee

      public static void removeAttendee(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Remove student from a camp. Student will be current user.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID is not found in the repository.
